item.title: Let‘s Expand Citus Co-location Single-Shard Distributed Tables
item.description: Explores how to enhance Citus for managing single-shard distributed tables that should be co-located efficiently, particularly in multi-tenant environments.

item.title: 在 Postgres 上复刻 AskBend！
item.description: 起因是在 3 月的时候刷到 Databend ai_to_sql 的一条 PR, feat: add ai_to_sql transalte natual lanauge to SQL based on your table schema by BohuTANG …
